//===== Hercules Script =======================================
//= Shop Street
//===== By: ==================================================
//= ThyroDree (Shopstreet) - Renew Mall Script
//= Virtue(All in 1 Mall NPC)
//===== Current Version: =====================================
//= 1.0 [ThyroDree]
//===== Compatible With: =====================================
//= rAthena SVN
//= Hercules SVN
//= Judas SVN
//===== Description: =========================================
// Mall in One NPC
//============================================================
turbo_room,99,121,4	script	Tool Dealer	895,{
        mes "[All in one trader]";
        mes "Welcome to ^FF0000ReviseRO: Rebirth^000000 ^000088All in one Trader^000000.";
        mes "Hello there ^FF0000" + strcharinfo(0) + "^000000.";
        mes "Please spend money";
        switch(select("^FF0000~Sell Items^000000:Usable Items:Smith Items:Elemental Tools:Chemist Tools:Ammunations:Poison Tools:Nothing")) {
        case 1: callshop "Toools", 2; end;
	case 2: callshop "Usable Items", 1; end;
	case 3: callshop "Smith Items", 1; end;
	case 4: callshop "Elemental Tools", 1; end;
        case 5: callshop "Chemist Tools", 1; end;
        case 6: callshop "Ammunations", 1; end;
        case 7: callshop "Poison Tools", 1; end;
        case 8:
                next;
                mes "[ Quick Mall ]";
                mes "Okay,come back when you need me.";
                close;
        }
}
//shops
-	shop	Usable Items	,662:1450,601:100,602:600,506:80,504:6000,505:12000,645:1600,656:3000,657:6000,1065:200,7045:10,618:100
-	shop	Smith Items	,1010:200,1011:1000,1002:50,757:20000,756:20000,1003:500,1001:1500,992:1000,998:100,999:1000,985:100000,984:100000,613:1000,614:3000,615:5000,1005:10,612:150
